actions.text: Reported to House from the Committee on Rules, H. Rept. 96-863.
Measure called up by unanimous consent in House.

official_title: A resolution providing for the consideration of S. 2009, to designate certain public lands in central Idaho as the River of No Return Wilderness, to designate a segment of the Salmon River as a component of the National Wild and Scenic Rivers System, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Sets forth the rule for the consideration of S. 2009 (Designating certain public lands in Idaho as the River of No Return Wilderness, and a segment of the Salmon River as a component of the National Wild and Scenic Rivers System).

titles.title: A resolution providing for the consideration of S. 2009, to designate certain public lands in central Idaho as the River of No Return Wilderness, to designate a segment of the Salmon River as a component of the National Wild and Scenic Rivers System, and for other purposes.
